tns:patch.author: vchihai
tns:patch.description: Add missing amp_location objects for amp_category_value_location

script.lang:
INSERT INTO amp_location (amp_location_id, name, location_id, region_location_id) SELECT nextval('amp_location_seq'), location_name, id, id FROM amp_category_value_location WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT location_id FROM amp_location) AND deleted IS NOT TRUE;
DELETE FROM amp_location WHERE location_id IN (SELECT id FROM amp_category_value_location WHERE deleted IS TRUE) AND location_id NOT IN (SELECT amp_location_id FROM amp_activity_location) AND location_id NOT IN (SELECT amp_location_id FROM amp_location_indicator_value);
